content: staghorn leg warmers warm yummy texture is paired with classic cables and my most favorite ribbing to hug close wear the cuffs folded up or down over leggings and your favorite boots pair with a thick wool yarn and you won t ever know it s cold when you go outside details yarn approximately 275 m 300 m 325 m or 300 yards 328 yards 355 yards of heavy worsted / aran weight wool specific yarn used in sample 2 skeins of hinterland range in truffle needles 4 mm / us sz 8 long circular needles for magic loop or a set of dpns notions stitch markers tapestry needle cable needle gauge 16 sts x 24 row = 10 cm / 4 inches in stockinette garment size s m l to fit calf sizes 30-35 cm 35-40cm 40-45cm or 12-14 14-16 16-18 length on all sizes 42 cm / 16 5 notes this pattern is easy to customize in length while the finished length is stated knitters can shorten or lengthen their legwarmers by decreasing or increasing the amount of body repetitions they complete each repetition adds about a 2 5 cm / 1 inch of length to the legwarmer example if you would like decrease the length by an inch do 12 repetitions of the body pattern instead of 13 the pattern hugs close so if you are on the fence about size i d recommend going up to the next especially if you know you ll pair it over other layers please note that the amount of yarn you will use will vary depending on the needle size and weight testers of this pattern found they used more yarn by going up in needle size and / or using a worsted weight instead of an aran weight yarn abbreviations bobble bind off k knit co cast on p
